00014 namespace ndarray {
00016 namespace detail {

00022 template <typename T, int N>
00023 struct FourierOps {
00024 
00025     template <int C>
00026     static void shift(
00027         T const * offset,
00028         std::complex<T> const & factor,
00029         ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,N,C> const & array,
00030         int const real_last_dim
00031     ) {
00032         typename ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,N,C>::Iterator iter = array.begin();
00033         T u = -2.0 * M_PI * (*offset) / array.size();
00034         int kMid = (array.size() + 1) / 2;
00035         for (int k = 0; k < kMid; ++k, ++iter) {
00036             FourierOps<T,N-1>::shift(offset+1, factor * std::polar(static_cast<T>(1), u * k), 
00037                                      *iter, real_last_dim);
00038         }
00039         if (array.size() % 2 == 0) {
00040             FourierOps<T,N-1>::shift(offset+1, factor * std::cos(u * kMid), *iter, real_last_dim);
00041             ++iter;
00042             ++kMid;
00043         }
00044         for (int k_n = kMid - array.size(); k_n < 0; ++k_n, ++iter) {
00045             FourierOps<T,N-1>::shift(offset+1, factor * std::polar(static_cast<T>(1), u * k_n),
00046                                      *iter, real_last_dim);
00047         }
00048     }
00049 
00050     template <int C>
00051     static void differentiate(int m, ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,N,C> const & array, int const real_last_dim) {
00052         typename ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,N,C>::Iterator iter = array.begin();
00053         int kMid = (array.size() + 1) / 2;
00054         T u = 2.0 * M_PI / array.size();
00055         for (int k = 0; k < kMid; ++k, ++iter) {
00056             if (m == N) (*iter) *= std::complex<T>(static_cast<T>(0), u * T(k));
00057             FourierOps<T,N-1>::differentiate(m, *iter, real_last_dim);
00058         }
00059         if (array.size() % 2 == 0) {
00060             (*iter) = static_cast<T>(0);
00061             ++iter;
00062             ++kMid;
00063         }
00064         for (int k_n = kMid - array.size(); k_n < 0; ++k_n, ++iter) {
00065             if (m == N) (*iter) *= std::complex<T>(static_cast<T>(0), u * T(k_n));
00066             FourierOps<T,N-1>::differentiate(m, *iter, real_last_dim);
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00070 };
00071 
00076 template <typename T>
00077 struct FourierOps<T,1> {
00078     
00079     template <int C>
00080     static void shift(
00081         T const * offset,
00082         std::complex<T> const & factor,
00083         ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,1,C> const & array,
00084         int const real_last_dim
00085     ) {
00086         typename ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,1,C>::Iterator iter = array.begin();
00087         T u = -2.0 * M_PI * (*offset) / real_last_dim;
00088         int kMid = (real_last_dim + 1) / 2;
00089         for (int k = 0; k < kMid; ++k, ++iter) {
00090             (*iter) *= factor * std::polar(1.0, u * T(k));
00091         }
00092         if (real_last_dim % 2 == 0) {
00093             (*iter) *= factor * std::cos(u * kMid);
00094             ++iter;
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     template <int C>
00099     static void differentiate(int m, ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,1,C> const & array, int const real_last_dim) {
00100         typename ArrayRef<std::complex<T>,1,C>::Iterator iter = array.begin();
00101         int kMid = (real_last_dim + 1) / 2;
00102         if (m == 1) {
00103             T u = 2.0 * M_PI / real_last_dim;
00104             for (int k = 0; k < kMid; ++k, ++iter) {
00105                 (*iter) *= std::complex<T>(static_cast<T>(0), u * T(k));
00106             }
00107         }
00108         if (real_last_dim % 2 == 0) {
00109             array[kMid] = static_cast<T>(0);
00110         }            
00111     }
00112 
00113 };

00115 } // namespace detail

00123 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00124 void shift(
00125     Vector<T,N> const & offset,
00126     Array<std::complex<T>,N,C> const & array,
00127     int const real_last_dim
00128 ) {
00129     detail::FourierOps<T,N>::shift(
00130         offset.begin(),
00131         static_cast< std::complex<T> >(1),
00132         array.deep(),
00133         real_last_dim
00134     );
00135 }
00136 
00142 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00143 void differentiate(
00144     int n,
00145     Array<std::complex<T>,N,C> const & array,
00146     int const real_last_dim
00147 ) {
00148     detail::FourierOps<T,N>::differentiate(N-n, array.deep(), real_last_dim);
00149 }
